settings.title: Flip Card
settings.directionsTextVer: Answer each of the following comprehension questions. Select each flip card to review the answer.

cardfront.text: How long is the Spring Festival celebration?

cardback.text: Its celebration lasts for 15 days, from the 1st day of the lunar new year to the 15th day. The 15th day is also known as the Lantern Festival.

cardfront.text: Who does the Dragon Boat Festival commemorate and why?

cardback.text: The Dragon Boat Festival commemorates the famous scholar in Chinese history, Qu Yuan, for his patriotism. He drowned himself in the Miluo River in honor of his nation.

cardfront.text: Name two activities for celebration of Moon Festival.

cardback.text:
Any two of the following:

  • Have family reunion dinner.
  • Eat mooncakes known as “yuebing.”
  • Appreciate the full moon.
  • Make colorful lanterns.
  • Play riddles or recite poems.

cardfront.text: What do the foods eaten during the Winter Solstice function as or symbolize?

cardback.text: Various types of foods are eaten during the Winter Solstice to symbolize togetherness of family and bring warmth to the body.
